00054 /*********************************************************************/
00060 void UARTPutChar (LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, uint8_t ch)
00061 {
00062         UART_Send(UARTx, &ch, 1, BLOCKING);
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 /*********************************************************************/
00071 uint8_t UARTGetChar (LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx)
00072 {
00073         uint8_t tmp = 0;
00074         UART_Receive(UARTx, &tmp, 1, BLOCKING);
00075         return(tmp);
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 /*********************************************************************/
00085 void UARTPuts(LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, const void *str)
00086 {
00087         uint8_t *s = (uint8_t *) str;
00088 
00089         while (*s)
00090         {
00091                 UARTPutChar(UARTx, *s++);
00092         }
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 /*********************************************************************/
00102 void UARTPuts_(LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, const void *str)
00103 {
00104         UARTPuts (UARTx, str);
00105         UARTPuts (UARTx, "\n\r");
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 /*********************************************************************/
00115 void UARTPutDec(LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, uint8_t decnum)
00116 {
00117         uint8_t c1=decnum%10;
00118         uint8_t c2=(decnum/10)%10;
00119         uint8_t c3=(decnum/100)%10;
00120         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c3);
00121         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c2);
00122         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c1);
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*********************************************************************/
00131 void UARTPutDec16(LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, uint16_t decnum)
00132 {
00133         uint8_t c1=decnum%10;
00134         uint8_t c2=(decnum/10)%10;
00135         uint8_t c3=(decnum/100)%10;
00136         uint8_t c4=(decnum/1000)%10;
00137         uint8_t c5=(decnum/10000)%10;
00138         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c5);
00139         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c4);
00140         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c3);
00141         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c2);
00142         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c1);
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*********************************************************************/
00151 void UARTPutDec32(LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, uint32_t decnum)
00152 {
00153         uint8_t c1=decnum%10;
00154         uint8_t c2=(decnum/10)%10;
00155         uint8_t c3=(decnum/100)%10;
00156         uint8_t c4=(decnum/1000)%10;
00157         uint8_t c5=(decnum/10000)%10;
00158         uint8_t c6=(decnum/100000)%10;
00159         uint8_t c7=(decnum/1000000)%10;
00160         uint8_t c8=(decnum/10000000)%10;
00161         uint8_t c9=(decnum/100000000)%10;
00162         uint8_t c10=(decnum/1000000000)%10;
00163         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c10);
00164         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c9);
00165         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c8);
00166         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c7);
00167         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c6);
00168         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c5);
00169         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c4);
00170         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c3);
00171         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c2);
00172         UARTPutChar(UARTx, '0'+c1);
00173 }
00174 
00175 /*********************************************************************/
00181 void UARTPutHex (LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, uint8_t hexnum)
00182 {
00183         uint8_t nibble, i;
00184 
00185         UARTPuts(UARTx, "0x");
00186         i = 1;
00187         do {
00188                 nibble = (hexnum >> (4*i)) & 0x0F;
00189                 UARTPutChar(UARTx, (nibble > 9) ? ('A' + nibble - 10) : ('0' + nibble));
00190         } while (i--);
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 /*********************************************************************/
00200 void UARTPutHex16 (LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, uint16_t hexnum)
00201 {
00202         uint8_t nibble, i;
00203 
00204         UARTPuts(UARTx, "0x");
00205         i = 3;
00206         do {
00207                 nibble = (hexnum >> (4*i)) & 0x0F;
00208                 UARTPutChar(UARTx, (nibble > 9) ? ('A' + nibble - 10) : ('0' + nibble));
00209         } while (i--);
00210 }
00211 
00212 /*********************************************************************/
00218 void UARTPutHex32 (LPC_UART_TypeDef *UARTx, uint32_t hexnum)
00219 {
00220         uint8_t nibble, i;
00221 
00222         UARTPuts(UARTx, "0x");
00223         i = 7;
00224         do {
00225                 nibble = (hexnum >> (4*i)) & 0x0F;
00226                 UARTPutChar(UARTx, (nibble > 9) ? ('A' + nibble - 10) : ('0' + nibble));
00227         } while (i--);
00228 }

00248 /*********************************************************************/
00253 void debug_frmwrk_init(void)
00254 {
00255         UART_CFG_Type UARTConfigStruct;
00256         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00257 
00258 #if (USED_UART_DEBUG_PORT==0)
00259         /*
00260          * Initialize UART0 pin connect
00261          */
00262         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00263         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00264         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00265         PinCfg.Pinnum = 2;
00266         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00267         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00268         PinCfg.Pinnum = 3;
00269         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00270 #elif #if (USED_UART_DEBUG_PORT==1)
00271         /*
00272          * Initialize UART1 pin connect
00273          */
00274         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00275         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00276         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00277         PinCfg.Pinnum = 15;
00278         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00279         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00280         PinCfg.Pinnum = 16;
00281         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00282 #endif
00283 
00284         /* Initialize UART Configuration parameter structure to default state:
00285          * Baudrate = 9600bps
00286          * 8 data bit
00287          * 1 Stop bit
00288          * None parity
00289          */
00290         UART_ConfigStructInit(&UARTConfigStruct);
00291         // Re-configure baudrate to 115200bps
00292         UARTConfigStruct.Baud_rate = 115200;
00293 
00294         // Initialize DEBUG_UART_PORT peripheral with given to corresponding parameter
00295         UART_Init(DEBUG_UART_PORT, &UARTConfigStruct);
00296 
00297         // Enable UART Transmit
00298         UART_TxCmd(DEBUG_UART_PORT, ENABLE);
00299 
00300         _db_msg = UARTPuts;
00301         _db_msg_ = UARTPuts_;
00302         _db_char = UARTPutChar;
00303         _db_hex = UARTPutHex;
00304         _db_hex_16 = UARTPutHex16;
00305         _db_hex_32 = UARTPutHex32;
00306         _db_dec = UARTPutDec;
00307         _db_dec_16 = UARTPutDec16;
00308         _db_dec_32 = UARTPutDec32;
00309         _db_get_char = UARTGetChar;
00310 }
00311 #endif /*_DBGFWK */
